Skills.Name: Bushin Vitalize
Skills.Description: Recovers own HP by <color=red>{0}%</color> of ATK. Further grants 3x <code=200,param=1001><color=#3398f1>Parry</color> for 15s.

Skills.Name: Bushin Surge
Skills.Description: Inflicts 2-hit DMG (<color=red>{0}%</color> + <color=red>{1}%</color>) on single enemy with highest ATK. Also lowers ATK by {2}% for 10s. Further inflicts <code=400,param=208><color=#3398f1>Provoke</color> for 3s.
Skills.ShortDescription: Inflicts 2-hit DMG, lowers ATK, inflicts Provoke on single enemy

Skills.Name: Bushin Fiery Defense
Skills.Description: <code=200,param=115><color=#3398f1>Shields</color> DMG (<color=red>{0}%</color> of skill user's ATK) of all allies for 15s. Further raises DEF by <color=red>{1}%</color> for 15s. Recovers own HP by <color=red>{2}%</color> of ATK.
Skills.ShortDescription: Shields DMG, raises DEF of all allies. Recovers own HP

Skills.Name: Strike Combo
Skills.Description: Reduces DMG Received for all allies by <color=red>5.00%-40.00%</color> for 5s according to Combo Bonus. Inflicts 100.00% DMG.
Skills.ShortDescription: Reduces DMG Received for all allies. Inflicts DMG on single enemy

Skills.Name: Crimson Spirit
Skills.Description: Each time <code=400,param=208><color=#3398f1>Provoke</color> is inflicted by self, lowers DMG Inflicted for all enemies by <color=red>{0}%</color> for 25s. (CT 2s)
Skills.ShortDescription: Each time Provoke is inflicted by self, lowers DMG Inflicted for all enemies

Skills.Name: Crimson Spirit: Iris Only
Skills.Description: At start of Wave and every 10s after, <code=200,param=115><color=#3398f1>shields</color> DMG (<color=red>{0}%</color> of skill user's ATK) of all allies for 15s. Further raises DMG Inflicted by {1}% for 60s if Human. Inflicts <code=400,param=208><color=#3398f1>Provoke</color> on all enemies for 5s.
